name: BLACKSKY-MD WhatsApp Bot
description: A sophisticated WhatsApp multi-device bot with enhanced connection reliability and 490+ commands

ADMIN_NUMBER.description: Your WhatsApp number without the + sign (e.g., 1234567890)

CREDS_JSON.description: WhatsApp authentication credentials (creds.json content). Paste the entire contents of the creds.json file here for direct deployment without uploading auth files.

RECONNECT_INTERVAL.description: Base reconnection interval in seconds (will use exponential backoff)

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'IMPORTANT: If you did not provide CREDS_JSON, you must manually copy auth_info_baileys contents to auth_info_heroku folder!'
